item.title: Does Defense Really Win Champiosnhips in the NFL?
More About Me
item.description: My name is Peter Rice and I’m a Sports Journalism Major at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I’ve had a passion for sports all my life and I want to make a career for myself in the sports industry! After graduating high school in 2018 I attended South Dakota State University for two years before transferring to UNL. While there, I was a student coach for the Jackrabbit football team where I traveled along taking video and entering stats along with various other tasks.
